title: Update public Menu section with extracted menu content and informational note

requirements.summary: Extract menu categories/items from the uploaded image and update the public Menu section data to show clear English names/descriptions and PKR prices while preserving search filtering.
acceptanceCriteria: When opening the Menu section, the menu is not empty and shows multiple categories with items based on the uploaded image content.
All menu item names shown to users are in English and are written clearly (no raw Urdu text displayed in the Menu list).
Prices from the uploaded image are entered as numeric values and render as "Rs. <amount>" in the Menu UI.
Menu search continues to work, filtering by item name/description across all extracted items.

file_operations.description: Create a seed menu data module (categories + items) transcribed from Screenshot_20260207-020802.jpg in English, including short helpful descriptions where appropriate and numeric PKR prices that render as "Rs. <amount>" in the UI.

Update MenuSection to use the extracted seed menu data as a fallback when backend-provided categories/items are empty, ensuring the existing search filters across the full (fallback or backend) item set and that item prices continue rendering as "Rs. <amount>".

requirements.summary: Add a short, tasteful English informational note above the search field in the public Menu section based on menu-wide info shown in the uploaded image (e.g., serving hours).
acceptanceCriteria: The Menu section shows a short English note above the search field (only in the Menu section).
The note styling matches the existing theme (uses existing Tailwind/Shadcn styling) and does not disrupt the menu list layout on mobile.

file_operations.description: Add a compact informational note (e.g., serving hours from the uploaded menu image) above the search input, using existing Tailwind + shadcn/ui primitives (without editing any files under frontend/src/components/ui) and keeping the layout mobile-friendly.
